snippet: Drone deliveries seem as overly optimistic as investors’ expectations of Amazon overall, the author notes. The company’s market value has ballooned to $180 billion, despite big profits always hovering in the future.
abstract: Drone deliveries seem as overly optimistic as investors’ expectations of Amazon overall, the author notes. The company’s market value has ballooned to $180 billion, despite big profits always hovering in the future.
